mapper.insert: insert into review values(review_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{image_path1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image_path2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image_path3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contents}, default, default, default )
mapper.select: select * from (select row_number() over(order by seq desc) as rown, review.* from review) where rown between #{start} and #{end}
